items.label: prop-velocity-gradient-uniform
items.title: Uniform Velocity Gradient Bound
items.content:
1540: :label: prop-velocity-gradient-uniform
1541: 
1542: Under Assumptions A1-A4 with $U \in C^3(\mathcal{X})$ (bounded $\nabla^2 U$, $\nabla^3 U$), there exists $C_v < \infty$ such that:
1543: 
1544: $$
1545: |\nabla_v \log \rho_\infty(x,v)| \le C_v
1546: $$

items.content:
1882: :label: prop-complete-gradient-bounds
1883: 
1884: Under Assumptions A1-A4 with $U \in C^3(\mathcal{X})$, there exist constants $C_x, C_\Delta < \infty$ such that:

1887: |\nabla_x \log \rho_\infty(x,v)| \le C_x, \quad |\Delta_v \log \rho_\infty(x,v)| \le C_\Delta
